message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're both aware, the market value of this product is $1,500,000. Given our mutual interest, I'm willing to make a generous offer to you. I'm proposing a price of $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair and competitive price, considering the value it will bring to your business. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I agree this product is valuable, but I'm aiming for a sharper price point. Would you consider $1,000,000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a sharper price point, but I'm still confident that $1,200,000 is a fair and competitive price for this product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of $1,100,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value this product will bring to your business. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate you working with me on this, Alice. While $1,100,000 is closer, I'm still hoping to land closer to $1,000,000. Would you be willing to settle at $1,050,000?

Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better price, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm proposing a new price of $1,075,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value this product will bring to your business. If we can't agree on a price, I'll have to consider other options. What are your thoughts?
